name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification. You play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an epic tale of life in America’s unforgiving heartland. The game’s vast and atmospheric world will also provide the foundation for a brand new online multiplayer experience.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an open-world action-adventure game, set in the Viking era. You play as Eivor, a fierce Viking warrior raised on tales of battle and glory.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC

name: The Last of Us Part II
description: The Last of Us Part II is an action-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world, where players control Ellie on her quest for revenge.

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake
description: Final Fantasy VII Remake is a reimagining of the iconic original with unforgettable characters, a mind-blowing story, and epic battles.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is a first-person shooter game that redefines the iconic Modern Warfare series, featuring a heart-pounding campaign, multiplayer modes, and special operations.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is an open-world adventure game where players explore the kingdom of Hyrule, solve puzzles, and defeat enemies.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is an action-adventure game that follows a shinobi named Wolf as he attempts to take revenge on a samurai clan.

name: Resident Evil Village
description: Resident Evil Village is a survival horror game and the eighth major installment in the Resident Evil series, continuing the story of Ethan Winters.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC

name: FIFA 21
description: FIFA 21 is a football simulation video game, featuring various modes including Ultimate Team, Career Mode, and VOLTA Football.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim is an open-world action RPG where players explore the vast world of Skyrim, complete quests, and develop their character.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC, Nintendo Switch

name: Borderlands 3
description: Borderlands 3 is a loot-driven first-person shooter with a focus on cooperative gameplay and an engaging story.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC

name: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Ghost of Tsushima is an open-world action-adventure game set in feudal Japan. Players control Jin Sakai, a samurai on a quest to protect Tsushima Island during the first Mongol invasion of Japan.

name: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring is an action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment, featuring an open world and a deep narrative developed in collaboration with fantasy novelist George R. R. Martin.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC

name: Mortal Kombat 11
description: Mortal Kombat 11 is the latest installment in the critically acclaimed franchise, providing a deeper and more personalized experience than ever before.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC, Nintendo Switch

name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: Animal Crossing: New Horizons is a life simulation game where players can build and manage their own island paradise.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales
description: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales is an action-adventure game that follows the story of Miles Morales as he masters his new powers to become his own Spider-Man.

name: Monster Hunter: World
description: Monster Hunter: World is an action RPG where players hunt down and defeat enormous monsters in a variety of landscapes.

name: Watch Dogs: Legion
description: Watch Dogs: Legion is an open-world action-adventure game set in a dystopian near-future London. Players can recruit and control any character they encounter in the game.

specifications.platform: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC

name: Halo Infinite
description: Halo Infinite is a first-person shooter game featuring the Master Chief in a new, epic adventure. Explore expansive environments, fight through challenging battles, and experience the next chapter of the Halo saga.

specifications.platform: Xbox One, Xbox Series X, PC
